net.cloud.mmo.event.task.voidtasks

Class CountedVoidTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cloud.mmo.event.task.voidtasks.CancellableVoidTask
      • net.cloud.mmo.event.task.voidtasks.CountedVoidTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VoidTask

    public abstract class CountedVoidTask
extends CancellableVoidTask
    A Task which will only execute a certain number of times (at least once)

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int EXECUTION_LIMIT
      The [constant] number of times the task will execute
      private int executionCount
      Count of how many times this task has executed, so far

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void countedExecute()
      Rather than use execute(), a CountedTask relies on countedExecute() to contain the custom code for the task to execute.
      void execute()
      Executes the task.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CountedVoidTask

        public CountedVoidTask(int executionCount)
        Subclasses should call this constructor.
        Parameters:
        executionCount - The number of times this task will execute (it will execute at least once)

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public final void execute()
        Executes the task. This method is final, and takes care of canceling the task after a certain number of executions. Instead, a new abstract method is introduced - countedExecute() - to contain the task's job code.

      • countedExecute

        public abstract void countedExecute()
        Rather than use execute(), a CountedTask relies on countedExecute() to contain the custom code for the task to execute.
